price: Maka ketika mereka masuk ke (tempat) Yūsuf, mereka berkata, "Hai Al-‘Azīz, kami dan keluarga kami telah ditimpa kesengsaraan dan kami datang membawa barang-barang yang tak berharga, maka sempurnakanlah sukatan untuk kami dan bersedekahlah kepada kami, sesungguhnya Allah memberi balasan kepada orang-orang yang bersedekah".
arabic: فَلَمَّا دَخَلُواْ عَلَيۡهِ قَالُواْ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡعَزِيزُ مَسَّنَا وَأَهۡلَنَا ٱلضُّرُّ وَجِئۡنَا بِبِضَٰعَةٖ مُّزۡجَىٰةٖ فَأَوۡفِ لَنَا ٱلۡكَيۡلَ وَتَصَدَّقۡ عَلَيۡنَآۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَجۡزِي ٱلۡمُتَصَدِّقِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: falammā dakhalū ʿalayhi qālū yāayyuhā al-ʿazīzu massanā wa-ahlanā al-ḍuru waji'nā bibiḍāʿatin muz'jātin fa-awfi lanā al-kayla wataṣaddaq ʿalaynā inna al-laha yajzī al-mutaṣadiqīna
